mapper.select: SELECT c.id , c.cust_id , c.item_id , c.cnt , c.rdate , cu.name AS cust_name , it.name AS item_name , it.price AS item_price , it.imgname AS item_imgname FROM cart c, cust cu, item it WHERE c.cust_id = cu.id AND c.item_id = it.id AND c.cust_id = #{id}
